    |----------|---------------|
    |  txt  |  Interface name  |

## Schema

### Required

- `identifier` (String) MD5 key id

    |  Format  |  Description  |

    |  Format  |  Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  txt  |  Interface name  |

### Optional

    |  Format  |  Description  |
    |----------|---------------|
    |  txt  |  MD5 Key (16 characters or less)  |
